MonsterTrait.Name: Fey Ancestry
MonsterTrait.Text: The drider has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drider to sleep.

MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text: The drider's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13). The drider can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: dancing lights 1/day each: darkness, faerie fire

MonsterTrait.Name: Spider Climb
MonsterTrait.Text: The drider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

MonsterTrait.Name: Sunlight Sensitivity
MonsterTrait.Text: While in sunlight, the drider has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

MonsterTrait.Name: Web Walker
MonsterTrait.Text: The drider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

MonsterTrait.Name: Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text:
The drider is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The drider has the following spells prepared from the cleric spell list:
• Cantrips (at will): poison spray, thaumaturgy • 1st level (4 slots): bane, detect magic, sanctuary • 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, silence • 3rd level (3 slots): clairvoyance, dispel magic • 4th level (2 slots): divination,freedom of movement

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The drider makes three attacks, either with its longsword or its longbow. It can replace one of those attacks with a bite attack.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Longsword
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

MonsterAction.Name: Longbow
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage.
